code: @Test public void testProduceAndBuildFullRemotFolderTest() throws Exception {     sendFile(getFtpUrl(), "Hello World", "claus.txt").     File file = new File(FTP_ROOT_DIR + "/upload/user/claus/claus.txt").     assertTrue("The uploaded file should exists", file.exists()).     assertEquals("Hello World", IOConverter.toString(file, null)). }
